sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Container,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  Box,
  TextField,
  Button,
  List,
  ListItem,
  ListItemIcon,
  ListItemText,
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  Phone,
  Email,
  LocationOn,
  AccessTime,
} from '@mui/icons-material';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';

const StyledCard = styled(Card)(({ theme }) => ({
  height: '100%',
  display: 'flex',
  flexDirection: 'column',
  transition: 'transform 0.2s',
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'scale(1.02)',
  },
}));

const ContactForm = () => (
  <Box component="form" noValidate autoComplete="off">
    <Grid container spacing={3}>
      <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
        <TextField
          fullWidth
          label="Full Name"
          variant="outlined"
          required
        />
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
        <TextField
          fullWidth
          label="Email"
          variant="outlined"
          required
          type="email"
        />
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={12}>
        <TextField
          fullWidth
          label="Subject"
          variant="outlined"
          required
        />
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={12}>
        <TextField
          fullWidth
          label="Message"
          variant="outlined"
          required
          multiline
          rows={4}
        />
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={12}>
        <Button
          variant="contained"
          color="primary"
          size="large"
          fullWidth
        >
          Send Message
        </Button>
      </Grid>
    </Grid>
  </Box>
);

const Contact = () => {
  const contactInfo = [
    {
      icon: <Phone />,
      title: 'Phone',
      details: ['+91 4259 200300'],
    },
    {
      icon: <Email />,
      title: 'Email',
      details: ['info@sece.ac.in'],
    },
    {
      icon: <LocationOn />,
      title: 'Address',
      details: [
        'Sri Eshwar College of Engineering',
        'Kondampatti Post',
        'Vadasithur Via',
        'Kinathukadavu',
        'Coimbatore - 641 202',
        'Tamil Nadu, India',
      ],
    },
    {
      icon: <AccessTime />,
      title: 'Office Hours',
      details: [
        'Monday - Friday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM',
        'Saturday: 8:30 AM - 12:30 PM',
        'Sunday: Closed',
      ],
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          bgcolor: 'primary.main',
          color: 'white',
          py: 6,
          mb: 6,
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Container>
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom>
            Contact Us
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h6">
            Get in touch with Sri Eshwar College of Engineering
          </Typography>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      <Container sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          {/* Contact Information */}
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
              Contact Information
            </Typography>
            <Grid container spacing={3}>
              {contactInfo.map((info, index) => (
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} key={index}>
                  <StyledCard>
                    <CardContent>
                      <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" mb={2}>
                        <Box
                          sx={{
                            mr: 2,
                            color: 'primary.main',
                            display: 'flex',
                          }}
                        >
                          {info.icon}
                        </Box>
                        <Typography variant="h6">
                          {info.title}
                        </Typography>
                      </Box>
                      <List>
                        {info.details.map((detail, idx) => (
                          <ListItem key={idx} sx={{ px: 0 }}>
                            <ListItemText primary={detail} />
                          </ListItem>
                        ))}
                      </List>
                    </CardContent>
                  </StyledCard>
                </Grid>
              ))}
            </Grid>
          </Grid>

          {/* Contact Form */}
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
              Send us a Message
            </Typography>
            <StyledCard>
              <CardContent>
                <ContactForm />
              </CardContent>
            </StyledCard>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>

        {/* Map */}
        <Box sx={{ mt: 8 }}>
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
            Our Location
          </Typography>
          <Card>
            <iframe
              src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3918.7479012123!2d77.0022699!3d10.8340556!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x3ba85c95c3c2d0bb%3A0x4365c6e587a0a40b!2sSri%20Eshwar%20College%20of%20Engineering!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1642432059000!5m2!1sen!2sin"
              width="100%"
              height="450"
              style={{ border: 0 }}
              allowFullScreen=""
              loading="lazy"
              referrerPolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"
            />
          </Card>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Contact;
